This is a good thing because I found that using it does not produce any usable photos.This is a very good compact camera, one that I would recomend to others in the market for a camera of this type. I did, in fact, tell my wife we needed to buy one for her use. However, I would only recommend it as a supplemental camera due primarily to the reliance on the LCD screen as a viewfinder. This, however, is typical of all compact cameras and should not be considered as a negative when considering this camera for purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great picture quality
Reviews.Author: Eddie Modes
Reviews.Content: The quality of the pictures are great, the only thing i dont like is that i can't zoom while i'm recording a video.

Reviews.Title: Decent Point and Shoot
Reviews.Author: Historian
Reviews.Content: Compact and well built.  Good zoom range but would have liked an F2.8 lens rather than 3.3 to 5.9.  If you don't mind shooting in auto mode all of the time, then this is a great little camera for you.  If you like to have control, then it will frustrate you.  Shutter speeds with the flash turned off hover around 1/15 to 1/30th of a second.  Image stabilization makes these images acceptable but not great considering that the camera has 14.4 MB resolution.Low light capability at ISO 1600 is very good and helps with non-flash images.  Noise is minimal, which is one of the features that led me to this camera.  The white balance in non-flash mode is very dull and border line acceptable.  Turning on iA mode (intelligent auto) helps this considerably, even though iA also fires the flash in most situations.  The flash results in iA are surprisingly good if you don't mind the reflective glare when up close.The macro modes work well.Battery life is better than other reviews indicate when using the CGA-S/106B battery, which came with mine.  Spare batteries are a little hard to find although available on Amazon.The HD video is very nice although your standard download programs may not see the file type.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: L. Pirela
Reviews.Content: I went shopping for a pocked point-and-shoot camera with a budget under $150. This is best I could get on this budget!! It has solid construction and it is very easy to use. This was a gift to my 12-year-old daughter, who has (had) no idea on how to take a picture. She is enjoying it a lot! ... and taking great pictures.The front is made of aluminum and its brushed finishing feels great. The back appears to be plastic (bummer), but feels OK. My main requirements for this camera were (a) good zoom (8X optical + 4X digital - 5 stars!); (b) image stabilization (5 stars); (c) low-light capability (4.5 stars - I still need to get into the manual to make sure I am not missing anything to take that perfect low-light picture, but we have taken great ones, including one with the Christmas tree); and (d) fast shutter (5 stars). My kids love sports, and now I can (finally) take pictures where the ball does not look blury!Besides the difficulty with low-light pictures, that could be our fault, the only little disappointment was the fact that one cannot adjust the zoom level during video recording. That would be a great add-on.One hint, here. I bought a Class-10 (10 Megabytes per second) SDHC memory card. The camera can handle it well and the manual says that the internal memory may be slower than Class 6 (6 MB/second)

Reviews.Title: Glad I bought it.
Reviews.Author: Shifterbrains "Steve"
Reviews.Content: I buy other brands,then after they break and I have the choice to make all over again,I buy Panasonic like I should've done in the first place. I've been researching sub-$180 digital cameras for a couple months now,and various FH20's have been in and out of my Amazon cart during that time,as I've looked around. My last camera was a Sony with continuous lens problems (DSC-S600),which seems to be common for Sony's to some degree.Besides this brand's proven track record (everything they make tends to last a while),just the reviews in general sold me on it. All "FH" Lumixes rate very well. I wanted the highest optical zoom in the series.My first impression of the camera when I unpacked it was it's sturdy feel. It feels well-built,and the design of the lens appears less likely to jam than some others. There is no rotary scene selector,but I can say that rotary switches don't always wear well. I prefer simple tact switches,which this unit uses. For most people,the automatic setting will be perfectly fine. Video recording is very clear,as are the pictures. Actually,the quality of the pictures that I just sat here on the couch and took were very impressive. Very clean and well-defined with excellent color. I'm not sure about sound quality yet. I need to play a movie clip back through something else other than the camera before I'll know for sure. Sounds low and tinny,but it may just be the playback through the camera. The menu is easy to figure out (I don't read manuals unless I can't figure it out on my own,usually.) I did scan through the instruction manual just to see if it was written well,and it's fine. No problem with the software installation on my laptop.Go ahead and buy the camera. The Transcend memory card that I bought with it works fine,btw.

Reviews.Title: Glad I made the decision.
Reviews.Author: Marc L
Reviews.Content: After reading about 100 different camera reviews I decided to go ahead and get this one. I saw that it was $60 cheaper refurbished and was initially apprehensive about taking the risk, but Im glad I did. This camera came in all it's original packaging and looks like its brand new. I'm so happy. I was gonna buy the Samsung Dual-screen TL225 but thought that would be a bigger risk.. This is great. Get it if you want a crystal clear camera that records video in HD and takes poster size pictures.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for its price
Reviews.Author: arsenalrulz
Reviews.Content: Pros1)Easy to use2) Good speed3)Good image quality4) AI feature is useful whie shooting at night5)Good video qualityConsNo zoom feature for video.

Reviews.Title: Great Video Quality
Reviews.Author: chachacharmin
Reviews.Content: Grea Video Quality- HD and even when I zoom in it still comes out fantastic. I don't quite feel the photos work the same with the zoom. For some reason the pictures are a little pixelated when I zoom in all the way, but the videos are not. I'm not sure the technicality of why the zoom works better with the video than with the photos, but it doesn't stop me from loving this camera. It's still FAR better than any other zoom camera I've used.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my girlfriends birthday to replace her broken camera.  What can I say? This camera is fantastic!!  The number of features the camera has is perfect including the 14 MP image quality, 8x optical zoom, 15/30/60 second shutter speed for nighttime shots, movie mode, continuous picture mode, etc.The camera has a few weaknesses, but out of a $150 digital point-and-shoot, that is to be expected.  Under low level lighting with full zoom, the picture quality gets grainy and the video mode needs a Class 6 or better memory card.  Low level lighting in general is a challenge for the camera.  Controls are fairly intuitive, LCD screen is big and bright.  The camera, for what it is worth, is a great camera and could rival those that are much more expensive.  For a simple point-and-shoot fit-in-the-pocket camera, this gets an A+.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: aurelius101
Reviews.Content: Our Fuji Finepix 3600 finally bit the dust after 6 years of very good service. We had never felt the need to replace it because the pictures were good enough for our use. How wrong we were. The pictures from this Panasonic camera are so much clearer, the colors more vivid, the details sharper. It was dramatic. My wife can even take good pictures with this camera, previously all of hers were blurry now they are sharp. Our dogs wagging tail is clear instead of blurry (It is seldom still). It took excellent pictures in bright sunlight and dark interior. It seems well made, not cheap. It did not come with a photo card so be sure to order one. I did not know there were different classes within the cards. other reviews and the instructions say if you plan to take videos you need at least a class 6 SD card. We have one ordered. For now we have a cheap 4GB Class 4 Sandisc SDHC card and it has done very well but have not taken any videos with it. Overall and excellent buy and I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: A great Camera and Price
Reviews.Author: David R. Hawkins
Reviews.Content: I've been looking for a compact camera for several months.  I"ve gone to "Box Stores', read reviews and had this model in mind plus others.After doing my research, I decided on the FH 20. If you follow the basic operation manual, you can't go wrong. The advanced manual is on the disc under operation manual. This is some 147 pages long. I printed only the pages that I was interested in.  It sure helps when you want to do some technical settings. I have only had this camera for 45 days, the quality of the pictures are great. Looking for more fun with the camera.

Reviews.Title: Everything I expected
Reviews.Author: ginarex "ginarex"
Reviews.Content: I did a bunch of research before buying this camera - and boy did it pay off! This little monster is the neatest thing since sliced bread. The Intelligent Auto feature lets me take beautiful pictures every time - and I am somewhere below rank amateur. It shows things the way I see them, and I don't have to monkey around with lenses and light adjustments. It's much lighter weight than I expected - the heaviest part is the telescoping lens. Use the string to make sure you don't drop this baby.Oh, you will want to read the instructions that come with it - unless you speak pictograph. The only English is on the front of the camera.

Reviews.Title: Bang for your buck!
Reviews.Author: omnomnom
Reviews.Content: I love photography but the camera I use for professional quality photos is way too bulky to be carrying around everywhere.  I got this camera for convenience (for times that I don't want to carry around my larger camera).  I had checked multiple places/sites and this one has the overall best reviews.  I am not disappointed.  It's extremely convenient and light and the photo qualities are great considering the price of the camera (obviously not professional pictures, but still higher quality).My mom and I both bought this camera and we are very satisfied.  I would recommend it to anyone as long as they're not trying to take photos of high high high quality (the zoom is good for everyday use and the shutter isn't exceptionally fast)  but overall, great camera!

Reviews.Title: panasonic Lumix DMC-FH20
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: Essentially I bought this camera to capture images that I use as subjects for my artwork.  I was looking for an inexpensive, small, simple high resolution camera that was fast enough to capture  candid images.  This camera performed excellently in almost everyway.  My only criticism was about the time it took to process each image was a little too slow but I think that is becasue it has a high MP rate (14) creating images that are around 1 mb.  On the more positive side; the computer interface was very simple and easy to use,  the autofocus worked great, good battery life, and it has the ability to capture low light images without a flash

Reviews.Title: Love that camera
Reviews.Author: Linny
Reviews.Content: I am enamored of my new panasonic camera. It has high quality sharpness and well worth the price. I am recommending it to all my friends who need a camera. There are many additional features that make it even more enjoyable. F.E. the camera can be changed to take black and white pics. I have not yet tried the video part of the camera but Im sure that I will be pleased with this too.

Reviews.Title: Good! :]
Reviews.Author: byjun87
Reviews.Content: The close up pictures are nice.  Need to have flash for indoor pictures or else comes out blurry.

Reviews.Title: Very nice for the price
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: This camera sells for less than the cost of a good lens so when you are reviewing it try to keep that in mind. I find all of these point and shoots excel in bright sunlight (don't all cameras). While you can get a decent picture indoors, you should set your expectations as moderate in that endeavor. Indoor lighting is more than opening a blind on one side, turning on the dining room chandelier (because it is annoyingly bright) and turning on an incandescent or cfl bulbed lamp in the corner and thinking you have achieved some proper lighting scenario. Lighting is complex at best and most indoor lighting sux for photography, plus you are using a stock lens. I mean do you really think at this price point all your pics are gonna look great? Well only in direct sunlight maybe.The video is touted as 720p and while I don't know about that, I will say that I am very impressed with the detail and clarity achieved in outdoor shoots. I stuck a class 6 card in there as suggested in the owners manual (even though a regular SD card seemed to work) and it is very smooth. I can rapid fire still shots as the data writes very quickly to the card. The feature set is rich and the menu friendly and intuitive. Overall, a great little performer AND I got it for a buck and a half through my employee discount. Oh, and great battery life as well!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera at a great price
Reviews.Author: Bill C
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera from Amazon based on user reviews of the camera. Wanted a new camera for an extended vacation to the western US. Camera took great pictures with very little adjustment.  I used the 'Intellegent Auto' setting for all my pictures (Approx. 700). Even low light pictures looked very sharp. Liked the compact size.This is my first camera with no viewfinder - so I had to get used to using the LCD. Battery Life was good. I took pictures all day with no battery problems. The 8x optical zoom works great for shooting wildlife pictues. Most pictures were very clear except a few at max zoom.Bottom line: Great easy to use point and shoot compact camera at an affordable price.

Reviews.Title: Very good camera
Reviews.Author: Burgess Donald
Reviews.Content: I don't know much about cameras and this is my first digital camera. I've been very happy and impressed with the picture and video quality that this camera puts out. The camera is a nice size and fits easily in my pocket. The battery has very good life and charges quickly. My only complaint is that when I zoom in, pictures are easily blurry but maybe I haven't turned on the image stabilizer. Like I said, great camera and as a first camera for a novice, I am satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera for the price. Great Quality!
Reviews.Author: Vince Garcez
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this camera a few weeks ago and so far I love it.  The quality of the pictures is far better than any other camera on the market.  If you an amateur photographer who loves to get out and take pictures, without having to lug a huge around camera around then is the perfect one for you.  The only drawback to this camera is that you cannot zoom in and out while you're taking video, but other than that this is a great camera for the price. I highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Easy use quality photo camera
Reviews.Author: Cynthia S. Hurley "Everybody's Mom"
Reviews.Content: even the technologically challenged can take great pics with this camera. Feature we were looking for is the ability to take a photo in a shadowy area and have it come out clear and bright. Excellent camera for the price!!

Reviews.Title: Some Good Some Not So
Reviews.Author: M. Humphrey
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for a trip to Las Vegas (see pictures posted here) and had mixed results.  I have the Panasonic TZ5 with the Leica lens and 10X zoom, and it does a terrific job, but I decided to get this small one for the trip.  Some of my pictures were astounding from a point and shoot.  Some of the night shots were exceptional, but inside shots were a mixed lot.  Some were strangely colored; others were fair, but few  were really good.  Sharp focus seems to be a problem inside.  People shots also are mixed quality.  I have yet to get a really sharp one on the auto setting.  I'm still playing with this camera so I take lots of pictures to be sure I get one good one of the subject I want.  I like the feel of the camera, and it's easy to learn all the settings, but quality isn't consistent.  I've had Canon, Sony, Casio and Panasonic digital cameras and currently have 4 that I use.  My older Canons took some fabulous shots, but I don't know if the quality continues.  The features for the price on this one are great, but if you're only getting one camera, I'd get the Leica lens on some of the other Panasonics with the big zoom.  The big zoom is the greatest.

Reviews.Title: Everything I expected.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Outstanding camera for a novice like me who just wants to point and shoot.  Easy to use, takes excellent pictures, and is pretty much plug and play.  I'd definintely buy another and recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Christine
Reviews.Content: This is a really great little point and shoot camera that I bought for a trip I'm taking soon. I tried it out at a concert I went to last night, and it worked pretty well. I wished I would have played with the settings before, because choosing which scene is right for your situation can be a little tricky. Overall, easy of use is excellent. The pictures look great in hi-res format and the video is the best quality I've seen off of a camera in this price range. I will see how well it works on my trip, but I definitely recommend buying it, it's worth it!

Reviews.Title: A Real Winner
Reviews.Author: Barbara Janaskie
Reviews.Content: There are times when I need a smaller camera and my DMC-FH20 is perfect.  It is easy to use and the results are great.  The movies are quite good eliminating the need for a video camera.  I would highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: excellent value
Reviews.Author: F. Kraus
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use with very good battery life. very good value for the money

Reviews.Title: JUNK
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Please dont buy this camera. Bought one for my wife at christmas. It broke in 2 days. Shutter wouldnt open because of a system error. Ok, i figured bad luck. sent it back to panasonic in mcallen texas, and quess what I get back a refurbished model! i paid for brand new why not send me a brand new camera. it was under warranty. Guess what the piece of crap broke on my Florida trip the day before we go to Disney world.I was soo pissed off . then i get back home and there is an email asking if i want to purchase an extended warranty for 29.00 dollars. panasonic , you should be ashamed of your selves selling this junk and stealing our money.

Reviews.Title: THE CAMERA!
Reviews.Author: Erdwing
Reviews.Content: I'm just in love with this camera. Its amazing the quality of it pictures. The first place where i took her after opening the box was a concert. those are the best pictures i ever seen in my life. you just got to learn how to play with the differents escenes modes or u just can click the IA botton and the camera will choose what escene mode fits the best for the place & light. The video quality is really HD the day after the concert with the VGA cable i hooked it to the TV on video mode and watched the videos of the concert i recorded and it was amazing it seemed like i was just watching a HD channel of MTV or something. haven't tried on daylight yet but if im that happy with the night results, im sure i wont be dissapointed with the daylight ones.BUY IT!Sincerely,Erdwing

Reviews.Title: Excellent Price for features
Reviews.Author: Debora K. Schneider "Cat Crazy"
Reviews.Content: I had a Sony PSC10 camera as my first digital camera.  Not bad but proprietary accessories and very slow.  Was impressed with the Panasonic camera. Nice display size with better viewing in daylight. Probably never use the 14MG picture size but what the heck.  Also the video quality has improved greatly even though it doesn't have zoom for the .MOV format.  For the price what do you expect.  Went ahead and bought a spare battery which was proprietary and a little pricey.Took a little bit of playing with camera to figure out how to use the internal and external memory.  The instruction book that came with it was lacking in details.  Had to go to the CD and download that manual to answer my questions.  Still haven't figured out how to sort pictures into files on the external SDHC disk.  Overall, I will enjoy using this little camera.Almost forgot one of the main reasons I bought the camera was for 8X optical zoom.  The stabilizing software takes a lot of the blurry out of zoomed pictures that are taken without a tripod.  At 8X you need a tripod but that is also expected.

Reviews.Title: Slooow data transfer
Reviews.Author: W. Cramer "matrix009"
Reviews.Content: Good camera, but why would Panasonic use a 1.1 usb. It takes forever to download pictures or video. Was a dealbreaker, I returned the item.

Reviews.Title: Sunny Day Mirror
Reviews.Author: Mirror Image
Reviews.Content: Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH20 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 8x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD (Black)This camera is the first one I have bought that does not have a view finder and I really regret it. There was no problem focusing on the subject indoors or outside in the shade. But, today I tried taking photos outdoors on a sunny day for the first time and all I could see was my own reflection looking back at me in the LCD screen! I tried shielding the top of the camera but that didn't work at all.  What a dissapointment this camera has turned out to be.  When I researched it almost every review praised its ease of use and while this is true, the problem with sunny day photography overshadows (no pun intended) any of the camera's other qualities.I am seriously considering returning it despite the fact that I will receive only an 80% refund as the purchase date was more than 30 days ago. A lesson learned the hard way!

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Ms. Lule "Sand"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, I received it pretty fast and in great shape from amazon. It is simple to use and takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Good Basic Camera
Reviews.Author: Francis Lim
Reviews.Content: I am one with absolutely no experience in handling a camera and nuts about 90% of the functions one camera has. This camera put all the function into auto mode, hence smoothen the learning curve on this camera.This is a super basic camera excellent for holiday documentation, party documentation and random photo takings. It works well for accident documentation for your vehicle. It is super clear and ease to use.All extras had been eliminated, hence able to keep the price so low. This had made it so value for money. I will and had recommended so many of my friends this camera due to the simplicity of this camera.Downside is that there is no international power adapter for this unit. I believe it is not expensive to include them so please include it. My part of the world uses 3 pin plugs.

Reviews.Title: second Lumix DMC-FH20K
Reviews.Author: GhostHawk
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera in 2010 it was the second one we owned.  The first one was crushed by a tractor, not the camera's fault. This camera is easy to use and takes fantastic photos I really loved that aspect of this camera. The macro feature was used a lot on flowers and cool bugs. The color is true to life and the photos are so clear and sharp for a point and shoot. Even evening, dusk and dawn photos are great. I used this camera for all kinds of adventures from taking pictures around the ranch, to hiking, and out in weather that it is not made for.  But I am only giving this camera a four star due to the fact that both camera's developed the same problem. And that was that the lens protector will not open all the way anymore and cuts off part of your photos or will focus on the part hanging in the way and not on you subject.  This is frustrating as you always have to check to make sure it has opened all the way and then your shot is gone. And even when you push them out of the way they get in the way.  The was my fault as I took some photos of the horses during a lite snow. But in all fairness I used this camera like a tough rugged camera, and for the four years we had this camera it did a fantastic job. We still have this camera but it is now the house camera and we are purchasing a rugged camera for outdoors and choose the Olympus tg 830. We would have gone with the Panasonic rugged camera as we liked this Panasonic, but the reviews on amazon made us shy away.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Al
Reviews.Content: I purchased this model FH-FH20K a few years back after doing ample research into similar small digital cameras and was very happy with it in every way possible, especially the 14.1MP clarity and the 8X optical zoom.  Unfortunately, because I liked it so much, I would take it everywhere in a pouch on my belt and it eventually sustained preasure damege from bumping into everyday things in life to a point that the lense covering became dented and eventually the lense became scratched.  The camera still works great, but the scratch was an obsticle I could not accept.  Since I had extra batteries and accessories, it made sense to replace it with the same camera and I am happy to get it through Amazon.  The replacement is like new and I am again carrying it everywhere, but now using a CaseCrown Hard Shell Case Cover that I also got through Amazon to protect it.  BTW, the battery life is simply great!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Wegienka
Reviews.Content: Absolutely loved this camera.  Can't say anything bad about it.  Took a great photo of my disabled dog using 14pxls.  Ruff Rollin Wheelchairs for Pets actually used the picture as a blowup 10' x 10' poster for trade shows because it was so clear.Sad part about the camera:  I recently dropped it and now it is not working properly.  I cried!!!  I am buying another one but an upgrade as they have changed over the past several years.  I would highly recommend the Panasonic Lumix cameras to anyone looking to buy a pocket camera that does not cost a fortune.

Reviews.Title: Defective shutter scratches camera lens!
Reviews.Author: AAyers
Reviews.Content: I've had the Lumix for a while and have been pleased with it until I recently noticed several fine vertical scratches on the lens (some are more like a dashed line ----). Each photograph, especially those where I've aimed into any kind of light source, have hazy white lines in the center of the photo. I couldn't figure out how I could have scratched the lens since the cover retracts automatically when it's not on. I am very careful with my camera and keep it in a lens case when being carried around. A little research turned this up: http://www.amazon.co.uk/Lens-scratches/forum/Fx39Y385WF8RDUQ/Tx1ZBKB3Z7Z73R8/1?_encoding=UTF8&asin;=B001T0H0RG. Apparently lots of other people have had this this issue. The scratches are due to a defect in the camera shutter which scratches the lens each time it closes. When I listen closely I can hear it making contact with the glass. I called Panasonic and spoke to Otis, a supervisor in their Camera Repair dept. and, as expected, he told me that I'd have to return it for repair at a cost of $128. He said "defect or not, it's out of warranty". And that's that. I will not be returning it for repair at that cost, of course. Nor will I ever buy another Panasonic product.

Reviews.Title: A great little camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: Peter Meyer
Reviews.Content: This is the second one I own of this model.  I foolishly took the first one into the Sahara desert and it got fine sand in it.  I searched online for another and bought the same one in an unopened box.  It takes good pics; it is a great size; it's a reasonable price; it is flexible, allowing normal shooting, autoshoot and useful choice of a broad range of selected scenes, including black and white.  Also shoots decent video with acceptable sound for family and travel shots and has a timer for night shots and delayed shot for the photographer to get in the picture.  it also does not have expensive bells and whistles like wi-fi that I don't use. I highly recommend it if you can still find it.

Reviews.Title: Great point & shoot camera
Reviews.Author: Emily M.
Reviews.Content: Easy to operate...slim design...nice clear, crisp pictures.  Offers a lot of bang for the buck.  14 megapixels offers nice quality

Reviews.Title: super duty
Reviews.Author: jonahtan navas
Reviews.Content: ilove this product, its very good, the pay is just for de quality, i am happy form my desicion. congratullations

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!!
Reviews.Author: Taea
Reviews.Content: I had this model of camera a few years back when it disappeared on me, bought this to replace it and is just as amazing as I remember! The digital zoom is one of my favorite options for I like to take pictures of birds, and you can get up real close with it. Not the best quality picture with digital zoom but for the price I got it at, it was well worth it!! One of the best cameras I've owned.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH20K 14.1 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Marc O Bowks, Sr.
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent camera.  Pictures come out great and can be blown up many times.  Love the zoom features and the video capabilitites.

Reviews.Title: Lumix Camera
Reviews.Author: M W
Reviews.Content: Panasonic Lumix Camera was a gift purchase and it arrived on time as agreed. I've been told the camera works great with no complaints. It's very easy to use and set up for the up loading of the picture to the computer is easy.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Pics
Reviews.Author: carolinagirl2001
Reviews.Content: This camera fits in all of my purses, even my cute evening bags without taking up too much space.  It also takes awesome pictures and has great zoom capability.  The menus are a little confusing, but if you take the time to read the manual and learn the camera it will produce great pictures!

Reviews.Title: My second Panasonic
Reviews.Author: Denise "online shopper"
Reviews.Content: I just love this point and shoot. I have bought two of them and recommended them to my friends, menus are intuitive so it's easy to use, takes great pics and fits in your pocket. Keeps its charge a long time.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Ivan Sanz
Reviews.Content: Excellent Product and Service. I have had this product for almost 2 years and it is still working perfectly, I completely recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: Panasonic lumix, a compact camera
Reviews.Author: A. Khan "ak"
Reviews.Content: I believe this camera excels all cameras that I have owned including the G7. reason, its simple to use, highly compact and with fantastic results, i paid USD 150.99 and that beats any other cameras price of its qualities.

Reviews.Title: Great little point and shoot
Reviews.Author: J. Loon "J."
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for 2 years. It takes great pictures outdoors and fairly decent indoor pictures. You do have to adjust the white balance while shooting indoors, otherwise you will get pictures that are too warm. The image quality is great, but if you blow up a picture to about 16 x 20 then the image gets soft. There is a bit of lag time between takes. It can be annoying if you are shooting live action shots or toddlers that are constantly on the move. Other than that, it is a great little camera for purse or pocket.

Reviews.Title: Great Point and Shoot
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Absolutely wonderful point and shoot camera, especially for the price. Picture quality is wonderful, and the zoom is much better than a lot of friends' cameras (More Expensive).

Reviews.Title: Great buy on camera
Reviews.Author: cinCC
Reviews.Content: This was a great buy on the camera.  I dropped and broke the last one I had and wanted one just like it.  I had a hard time finding the same camera in stores.  This was a prefect solution. It was reconditioned but works great. I had purchased an extra battery for my original and wanted to be able to use it. The seller shipped very quickly. In all a very good buying experience.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic
Reviews.Author: Father H. R. Goodman
Reviews.Content: I saw one of these some time ago and have been looking for an affordabile one.  When I saw this one, I snapped it up.  It fulfils or exceeds my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Great Pictures
Reviews.Author: Steve D.
Reviews.Content: This is my very first point and click camera and so far I have no complaints. It's small, light, and takes great pictures with vibrant colors and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for on the go
Reviews.Author: Beth K
Reviews.Content: This little camera takes high quality pictures with resolution high enough to make large prints.  Bought for taking pictures at high school graduation,and the pictures came out sharp and focused even in an indoor arena.  A little yellowy color, but more because of the location than the camera.  Be aware that it has a rechargeable battery, not AA etc.  Might want to order an extra.  Only draw back from my side.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Mike M "Mike M"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera with a 8mb memory card and took it on vacation.  Great quality pictures, each battery charge gave me at least 100 photos.  I did not use the video and haven't needed support so I haven't rated them.  I like it because it is small enough to fit in a pocket, not very heavy and takes great photos.  Not much more you can say about a point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We bought this based on reading several positive reviews on it.  We love it!  We are very happy about the picture quality and the ease of switching from picture to video.  Highly recommended camera for day to day pictures and vacations.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera, I love the zoom and battery life.
Reviews.Author: cirekcr "Erick4"
Reviews.Content: It's an excellent camera, very low price for what it does. I really like it and the pictures look great, even the ones taken with zoom.The battery life is very reasonable, you can take around 600 pictures. And it charges very fast, around 3 or 3 and half hours.

Reviews.Title: Pleased with purchase
Reviews.Author: MikeO
Reviews.Content: Pleased with the many features that come with this model.Not too easy to use but exciting to explore.Should have more details especially on " Q.MENU "

Reviews.Title: Luminex Camera
Reviews.Author: poodle
Reviews.Content: Not what I thought it would be. Does not stabilize the picture as it claims.  The video feature  is difficult for me to use. The playback of pictures is good.  I tried the video feature and had trouble starting it and stopping it. I would have hoped the operation be in the book, but it was on CD, so I have to have my computer on everytime I want to look up a question about any operations of the camera. That is not always convenient.

Reviews.Title: Great Pocket Sized Camera
Reviews.Author: G. Wilson
Reviews.Content: Wow!  My Son-in-Law had one in Hawaii.  What wonderful pictures and great videos.  I even took some of him but the grandson got most of my attention. I liked his camera!  When we returned, Amazon had a similar one (a little less zoom)at a refurbished price.  I don't know what makes it refurbished.  I cannot tell that anyone else ever held it.  It has all of the features that I need including 8 Zoom and stabilization.  You cannot use this much zoom without a tripod or stabilization.  I have always used Nikon in the past.  I chose this one over the Nikon and am very happy with it.  I would do it again.  Have not used technical support but I have a Panasonic TV and a home theater.  They have always been great at helping me with any question.  I suspect this will not be an exception.  They seem to realize how important customer support is.  Hope you enjoy yours as much as I have mine.

Reviews.Title: camera is ok, good deal
Reviews.Author: di
Reviews.Content: camera was a good deal, bought it refurbished.  disappointed in the shutter speed, I thought it would reload faster and allow me to take another picture quickly but there is a slight delay before you can shoot off another picture

Reviews.Title: Smart Choice
Reviews.Author: Sebastian Stacey
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera for the price.  Very easy to use.Took great pictures from the top of Cadillac Mountain in Bar Harbor as well as of deer at sunset.Battery seems to have a good life.I took the suggestion of another reviewer and purchased a 16gb storage card.  I would recommend this to anyone buying this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Smaller-sized Point 'n Shoot
Reviews.Author: Caroljane "Kidney cancer survivor"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera from the Deal of the Day on Amazon.Received the camera, all parts, an SD card and a leather case for the camera... all shipped and delivered quickly from Woot. Refurbished.Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH20K 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 8x Optical ImageI wanted a smaller point 'n shoot camera since my other point 'n shoot is a bit larger.I am quite happy with the quality of the pictures of this camera and it's very easy to set and use.I haven't tried the video portion out yet, I've only snapped photos.If I have any problems with the video portion, I'll update this review. For a pocket size point 'n shoot... this was a bargain.Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH20K 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 8x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD (Black)When I put the camera in the case... I put the telescoping lens in the back of the case so I don't "snap" the case closed right over the lens, thus not putting any extra pressures on the lens.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Henning Andersen
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera sight unseen for my wife. It was delivered at my home while I was away. By the time I returned home, my wife was raving about the EASE of use of this camera. She is taking pictures like a pro. Many lectures are close up shots of birds in our bushes and trees. This camera is absolutely great!

Reviews.Title: Disappointed in Panasonic
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: I had an older Lumix model that broke simply of over-use and old age  (FH37?).  It had an autobraketing feature which was very nice to have, especially for a point and shoot.  I would normally buy a Canon P&S; as they have better image quality than the Panasonics, but wanted the autobracket feature which Canon does not have.  Panasonic has removed the autobracket feature from the menu of this new camera, even though the interface is the exact same.  Very disappointing Panasonic.  It costs nothing extra to put this feature in.  No reason to buy Panasonic again for me

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Steven Eckhardt
Reviews.Content: POCKET SIZED, GREAT PICTURES, EASY TO USE, GREAT OPTICAL ZOOM AND GREAT VALUE.Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH20K 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 8x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD (Black)

Reviews.Title: Lumix DMC-FH20K Review
Reviews.Author: Rony
Reviews.Content: Works great and is easy to use. At first I couldn't get the flash to work but once I learned how to turn off the "BURST" mode where the flash isn't intended to operate, everything worked well. I'm not a photographer so I let the camera do all of the settings. The pictures come out great. I installed a 8GB memory stick. Even at the highest pixil setting of 14MB, the camera produces about 1500 pictures.

Reviews.Title: Slim, easy to carry and sharp pictures
Reviews.Author: D. Tuttle "dtuttle"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife who had been using an excellent Fuji 9MP camera that shoots raw for several years.  This is smaller with higher resolution.  Purchased after reading several stellar reviews outside of Amazon.  It worked so well that I got one for my daughter too.  Definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: AWSOME LITTLE GUY
Reviews.Author: Vincent Costantino
Reviews.Content: LOOKING TO DOWNSIZE FROM MY OLYMPUS 520DSLR FOR BIKE TRIPS I CAME ACROSS THIS CAMERA. SIMPLE TO USE, GREAT ZOOM, AMAZING MOVIE FEATURE. IF YOUR INTO CAMERAS AND TAKING PICTURES THIS IS A GREAT ADDITION TO YOUR NEEDS. A+++

Reviews.Title: Great camera, outstanding price.
Reviews.Author: Martie
Reviews.Content: I have traveled the USA with this camera and emailed my pictures all over.  Everyone says they are incredible.  Great camera.

Reviews.Title: True Value for $$$
Reviews.Author: Preetham Kottary
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a small pocket camera that would shoot decent pics and yet be affordable. I came across this camera in [...] as the best overall camera for 2010. The 8x zoom is pretty stable in daylight. image quality is not so great in low light although static pics at high ISO are better than most bridge cameras.Pros: - 8x Zoom, Very good image stabilization, brilliant sunlight performance - ideal for day trips when you don't want to carry a bulky camera. this one easily fits in your pocketCons:- proprietary Panasonic battery - I'd recommend buying another spare battery.Note on buying additional batteries - Please buy genuine Panasonic batteries. The standard package comes with the required battery charger hence you don't need to buy a charger separately.Overall, its a very good value for $120. its priced at least $50 higher in other stores like Bestbuy, Fry's etc.

Reviews.Title: Great easy to use point & shoot
Reviews.Author: AV
Reviews.Content: Easy to use. Got it for my mother and she learned to use it quickly. iAuto mode is awesome and takes care of most requirements. Great pictures. Overall an excellent value for money camera.

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot for the price
Reviews.Author: Thelius
Reviews.Content: At this price point I simply don't think you can find a better camera.  Easy to use and takes good pictures.  Bought it for a trip to Europe and it did not fail me at all.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Happy Shopper
Reviews.Content: I like this camera a lot, it's easy to use and takes amazing pictures. The only thing I don't like is that I have to switch "modes" from taking the picture to view them. I'm sure most people are like me they like to see the pic right away and having to switch modes is kind of a pain in the butt. Besides that the camera is great.

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: Whisper
Reviews.Content: I recently bought this camera for my father, he's 78 and isn't good with complicated electronics; this camera is very easy to use and takes beauiful pictures.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: smartshopper4life
Reviews.Content: I have never owned a digital camera before and was very pleased that I purchased this camera after reading all the great reviews including one which gave details about memory card suitability etc. I am very happy with how easy the camera is to use, how clearly it takes pictures and the zoom capability. I don't consider myself an expert at anything technological but this camera is very friendly for amateurs like me as well as those who are more seasoned who can take advantage of the many features it offers. The order was processed quickly and shipped speedily - it got to me just in time for a road trip and I got some awesome shots. I purchased the camera along with a case logic case and a class 6 4gb memory card and so far so good. The case holds the camera well and is easy to carry around. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix
Reviews.Author: Kathy Dodd
Reviews.Content: I have not gotten to use this camera very much yet, but what I have used it for I have loved. I really like the small pocket size. It has good zoom capabilites and nice picture quality.  It is way above my other name brand camera that I have been using. I would reccommend this camera to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Muy buena
Reviews.Author: rosario reggie "rosario"
Reviews.Content: Producto de buena calidad, en perfectas condiciones, toma buenas fotos con colores vivos, contenta con mi compra, vendedor responsable, gracias.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Paul Gittleson
Reviews.Content: Good camera just for sticking in your pocket and taking snapshots.  The zoom was disappointing for my purposes so I returned it and moved up a step.  Good for people not interested in doing anything fancy.

Reviews.Title: manufactur's warranty
Reviews.Author: Savanah's mom
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for the purpose of taking pictures of my new born and when I pulled it out my baby bag the lens was open and it wouldn't close. I returned it to panasonic and they wrote me a letter back stating that the problem was that the lens was dented and the warrenty does not cover that. They offered me a refurbished model for $130 (I believe I paid $150 for the camera that I sent in). I held off before I made my decision and thank goodness I did because I found the updated model that is touch screen (panasonic lumix) at Best Buy for only $100!!!! I do like the product and find it easy to use but I'm still learning how to use the different settings. But what a rip off from the panasonic company.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera works great wih clear quality
Reviews.Author: Ernny
Reviews.Content: the camera works great the pixel quality is great and the size is very portable. but the camera change switch is not coordinating

Reviews.Title: Very happy with camera
Reviews.Author: B. Russ
Reviews.Content: This camera is very easy to use. The zoom works great and the picture quality is very good in low light conditions. Definitely a good value.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: kmbere "kberen"
Reviews.Content: What an excellent little camera. I was looking for a good camera to capture my 2 year in action and found the perfect camera. I bought a Kodak first and found it to be junk. I am happy with this little camera for my novice use and limited budget!

Reviews.Title: Good one
Reviews.Author: Neoz
Reviews.Content: Only bad thing but it is with all cameras this days is that it takes cuple seconds to turn it on...

Reviews.Title: Amazing little camera!
Reviews.Author: Dondo
Reviews.Content: I looked at every single camera in this price range & the reviews/numbers didn't lie. Happily the camera didn't either. The software is also top shelf & easy to use.Totally jazzed & satisfied. Recommend this? Oh Yeah!

Reviews.Title: great and simple!
Reviews.Author: JL
Reviews.Content: Just bought it for my mom. I needed a small, easy-to-use, women's bag-ready camera, and this one fit all of these!Great zoom, simple commands, great pics!!

Reviews.Title: nice pocket
Reviews.Author: Pablo de Buenos Aires
Reviews.Content: it's great as a pocket, the video quality is really amazing and the files have an efficient size, so you really have much resources in a small space at your pocket.Personally i think it's not simple to change between photo and video mode and the photos with not enough light are so poor. But with sunlight the quality is great.

Reviews.Title: one of the best value camera around
Reviews.Author: Kevin Chan
Reviews.Content: This is probably one of the best value budget cameraPros:Great picture quality, vibrant colors, sharpEXCELLENT ZOOM for a compact cameraGood HD videoCons:Low light w/o flash is little to be desired but it is to be expectedOverall this is a great unit

Reviews.Title: AWESOME CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Paul A. Mcguire
Reviews.Content: Got this for my fiance and she loves it. Lots of features easy to navigate and great quality in picture.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: K. J Kozuch
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my son for Christmas based on reviews and looks. From what he has said so far this is a pretty nice camera. Takes good pictures and is nice and compact. Can't beat the price either!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent value, 8x zoom adds a lot of versatility
Reviews.Author: aceofbase
Reviews.Content: I agree with all the other positive reviews! I bought this for my wife, it was really easy to use, she was taking great pictures within minutes of opening the box. She even managed to figure out the basics without reading the manual! The 8x optical zoom is better than any other compact this size and price and was the main reason I went for this model. I dialled resolution down to 5MP and it 'crops' out the unused pixels to get a FOV equivalent to ~13x zoom. The added focal length really makes this camera more versatile than others IMO. Video is a bonus (and pretty good quality in daylight) but probably wont get much use. Its really an auto-only camera, there are minimal manual settings but users of this camera wont want them anyway. Speed and photo/build quality wise its no match for a DSLR or higher end compact but at ~USD$125 the value for more than makes up. I even bought two more for other family members, they love it too!

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH20
Reviews.Author: butterfly
Reviews.Content: REceived  before Christmas.I am amzed how easy  it is to  use. MY family passed it around taking group pictures and  said  the same thing. Strongly reccomed this camera

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Eric Stang
Reviews.Content: We have a nice DSLR camera that we use for everything right now and it was just way too big to bring around everywhere. So after quite a bit of research we decided to go with this camera. It's nice and small, can fit in your pocket and it takes excellent photos. I would highly recommend this camera. The worst part about it is the software that comes with it seems kind of cheesy and not very user friendly. The camera itself though is as good as it gets for a point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH20K
Reviews.Author: Bambi
Reviews.Content: I got this product just the other day, and I love it! The picture quality is amazing and the camera is so small and compact. I love how this camera has so many different settings and they are so easy to use. Pictures in the dark have a little bit of noise, but that's the be expected from almost any digital camera. I must say, I don't regret this choice over my Sony Cybershot DSC-W370. My old camera was losing it's detail, had some clicking sound in the video, and even lagged when taking pictures.This camera is a great buy and well worth the price!

Reviews.Title: Compact camera
Reviews.Author: theresa goicoechea
Reviews.Content: Love it. Easy to use and figure out. Great pictures. Still learning all other stuff but compact and great zoom.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic cam
Reviews.Author: alasdair mccondochie
Reviews.Content: So far so good with this compact camera. It seems to take pretty good pics; alhtough, had some difficulty with really dark images when shooting indoors with flash. Using the iA mode and adjusting the pic size seems to have helped with that. Really easy to access menus; especially like the quick menu button which lets you change basic setting on the fly. Video seems to be pretty good so far. Little disappointed, as others have said with the lack of direct link to t.v. for hidef.

Reviews.Title: Amazing bang for the buck
Reviews.Author: Def Voorhees "ryaoni_2000"
Reviews.Content: Ease of use and picture quality are impressive.  The HD video quality is very good and easy to upload to Youtube.  There are a lot of options or easy automatic settings.  All around great product that rivals any other top brand of camera.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH20K Camera
Reviews.Author: Ian
Reviews.Content: Great, compact camera with excellent picture quality. Perfect point and shoot device that suits our needs. We have not used the camera's video feature as yet therefore cannot provide any report regarding this functionality.

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: Z. Miller
Reviews.Content: I read a lot of reviews and finally settled on this camera.  So far so good with it.  It is still blurry in low light/no flash unless you have a super steady hand or set the camera on something but I think most cameras that are point in shoot at a reasonable price are that way.2/14/13 Update:  Still works great.  It is pretty tough and has survived multiple drops.  Still taking great pictures for a point and shoot.  Very satisfied purchase.

Reviews.Title: "SLICK" LOOKING CAMERA, BUT NOT QUITE UP TO [SHUTTER] SPEED!!
Reviews.Author: LOUISE B. NESTIN' "BOOK MAVEN EXTRAORDINAIRE"
Reviews.Content: SO I PURCHASED THIS ITEM MOSTLY TO CAPTURE DIGITAL PHOTOGRAPHS OF MY TWO CATS, AND SO FAR THE RESULTS HAVE BEEN MIXED - QUITE LIKE THEIR PERSONALITIES!DURING THE DAY WHEN I DECIDE TO OPEN MY BLINDS AND LET NATURAL LIGHT IN, AND ALSO TURN ON ALL THE LIGHTS IN THE HOUSE, THE PICTURES COME OUT OK. WHEN IT IS DIMMER AND THERE IS LESS LIGHT, THE PICTURES COME OUT TWO STEPS ABOVE TERRIBLE.ALSO, IF I SNAP PIX OF THEM WHEN THEY'RE SLEEPING, THEY COME OUT BETTER! BUT ONCE THEY MOVE AROUND AT ALL THE IMAGE QUALITY SUFFERS AND THEY ARE BLURRY. I NEED A CAMERA THAT IS A POINT-N-SHOOT THAT IS CAPABLE OF CAPTURING THE BEAUTY OF MY CATS WITHOUT HAVING TO SET UP A FULL-ON PHOTO STUDIO IN MY LIVING ROOM!! COME ON, PANASONIC!!IM GIVING IT 4 STARS SINCE I LIKE HOW THERE IS A LITTLE TINY STEEL DOOR THAT HIDES THE PLACE WHERE THE USB CABLE CONNECTS INTO. ITS REALLY CUTE AND REMINDS ME OF A TRAP DOOR OR A CAT DOOR. BOTH ARE GREAT AND IT REALLY BOOSTS MY MOOD WHEN I SEE IT OR EVEN THINK ABOUT IT !!

Reviews.Title: excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Lucas
Reviews.Content: this was the replacement for my Nikon CoolPix, which had a lot of noise in the low light situations and never lived up to the Nikon reputation. love the long optical zoom on this Lumix, as well as the OIS. sharp image in all lighting situations.

Reviews.Title: Suits my needs very nicely
Reviews.Author: Marge
Reviews.Content: After considerable research, I bought this camera as a replacement for a ten-year-old Olympus with a 10X zoom that finally gave up the ghost, so to speak.  My goal was a reasonably priced camera that would give me about the same capabilities as the Olympus but did not require a lot of thought or skill.  I'm very pleased with the Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH20. Operationally, it's extremely intuitive.  Physically, it's a cute little thing - I bought a case for it, but it still fits nicely in my purse. The controls are tiny, necessarily so, but minimal and easy to figure out. I'm respectful of electronic equipment, so will not give it hard wear - it might be a little dainty for a burly guy.  I'm pleased with the photos I've taken thus far, but I'm not a professional photographer and don't do "glamour shots". As far as I can tell after a brief period of ownership, this camera offers good bang for the buck.  Hope it lasts as long as my Olympus!

Reviews.Title: Excelente camara
Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: Es una buena camara fotografica, las imagenes son de calidad y sus caracteristicas son muy buenas ya que permiten tener una excelente experiencia sin ser un experto en fotografías

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: M. Soltis
Reviews.Content: We wanted a small point and shoot that had a good zoom and this seems to be meeting our needs,

Reviews.Title: Satisified with the product, for the price i bought
Reviews.Author: Selva Maran
Reviews.Content: Photo quality was decent for the price i bought (100 dollars). When i compared other companies the price was much better for the same options (14x,8x zoom). Able to hook to computer instantly and transfer photos. I just use it for taking casual photos and not an expert in photography, so can't comment in fine details.

Reviews.Title: Buy This Camera!
Reviews.Author: Tania D. Carey
Reviews.Content: Great zoom and a wealth of features, we are super-pleased with this camera!  The Intelligent Auto (IA) feature makes picture taking a snap and I used a dozen different scene types to create some really nice shots of our Christmas tree last night.  The video is clean and crisp and we are just scratching the surface of this device.

Reviews.Title: Only if you shoot in crisp broad daylight, for low/little light - avoid this one
Reviews.Author: Sam "SG"
Reviews.Content: This is one of my several digital cameras (all the way from 1MB Sony to 7+MP Canon). I wanted convenience to carry around a quick point and shoot camera that fits into my pocket vs a big SLR (Looked at Nikon 3100 but too big). I have owned couple Panasonic TV's since ages which never seem to break down, so that was good brand recognition. Since it was gift shopping time I figured I will up myself to a 14MP, in case I need to blow up any pictures to larger size.I am not much into customizing any settings (that is why a point n shoot) - takes too much time when you need to click NOW, especially when there is technology which can figure that out for you. I guess you get what you pay for.In general I am ok with this point and shoot as long as you do that in broad daylight on a bright and sunny day. Low light conditions and night on auto mode are really bad, and almost all pictures with low light have been very disappointing. My 3 year old 7MP Canon seems to do a lot better in that instance.

Reviews.Title: A Replacement Camera
Reviews.Author: tank
Reviews.Content: Good camera, easy to use out of the box, very good low light pictures, which we were looking for, features are good and price good as well.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Susan J. Viau "Sue V"
Reviews.Content: I used the Lumix camera over Thanksgiving and it was easy to use, I'm use to a view finder, that it takes a little time to hold the camera still before taking the picture.  I'm sure that after I get use to the picture screen I will be a pro.

Reviews.Title: best one
Reviews.Author: Robert J. Davidson
Reviews.Content: You will never regret buying this point & shoot ..Simply put .. THE BEST !I liked it so well , I bought one for my buddy after his camera was stolen.Consumers reports rates it the best in class ..EASY to use, takes great videos ...Great computer program comes with it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: George
Reviews.Content: It does everything I wanted, for the price I got it it was one of the best deals I ever made.

Reviews.Title: REALLY GOOD CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Kaysee
Reviews.Content: I've only had this camera for about a month but I am very pleased with it. It takes excellent pictures and especially in "low light". I have only used the video portion a couple of times. The quality seems to be good but I was surprised to find out that you could not zoom in on your subject once you start recording. That is a bit unusual but it does state that in the manual. Just something good to know if you plan on using the video portion of the camera a lot. Otherwise, I am very pleased with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great Pictures with no blurring
Reviews.Author: Eliminator Man
Reviews.Content: I owned a similarly priced camera but cracked the screen and had to get a new one.  Probably at least half of my pictures with that old camera were blurry and unusable.  So far I have taken about 100 shots with this camera and had not one blurry image.  I'd say this image stabilization feature is excellent and I would buy this camera again.

Reviews.Title: This is great!! One of the most worthy bucks I spent this year
Reviews.Author: aaron
Reviews.Content: This is one of my favorite cameras. I used to be a sony camera user and their quality is pretty good. But when I switched to panasonic this time, the photo quality even surprised me !!

Reviews.Title: digital camera
Reviews.Author: Karen A. Pohlman "Nonfiction lover"
Reviews.Content: I find the ease of use not as easy as my old Casio camera so in time and with practice I'll probably enjoy it - the picture quality is great but the use of the video is a little awkward.

Reviews.Title: Looks great so far.
Reviews.Author: Spore
Reviews.Content: Purchased one of these for my dad. He thinks its a great camera and so do I. I took a couple of sample pictures and the picture quality is great. 8x Optical Zoom really helps as well.

Reviews.Title: great camera!
Reviews.Author: missy
Reviews.Content: Took this camera on vacation. It took great pictures. The videos were great. Just had a little problem trying to figure settings since I'm not a camera whiz. But overall it's a great compact camera with nice pictures and long battery usage.

Reviews.Title: Way beyond what I expected!
Reviews.Author: tsmith77
Reviews.Content: This camera was more than we expected. We used it everyday for two weeks in Europe and loved how easy it was to use. The low light photos were excellent. Far better than any other camera we've ever had. The battery lasted plenty long -- again better than other cameras.

Reviews.Title: fh-20
Reviews.Author: sightseer
Reviews.Content: i haven't used the video feature yet. i ride a motorcycle and wanted a camera with a good zoom feature.this camera is excellent .it is also very user friendly.thank you Panasonic and amazon for your great low price.

Reviews.Title: LUMIX FH20
Reviews.Author: Sandra Planeta
Reviews.Content: This little camera is great for me...point and shoot...easy to use, but also has lots of options for a variety of pix as well as video...good quality pictures...small and light weight enough for me to carry in my purse all the time...very handy. After a lot of research, I'm glad I chose this Panasonic...perfect for my needs.

Reviews.Title: Great Point And Shoot!
Reviews.Author: AFD326
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item as we were going to a Yankees game.I have a NIKON D70s but didn't want to have to lug the big camera with the two lenses around during the game. The first I used it was at the game, I was three rows off the field and with the zoom I was able to get great pics of the players and the game. I would recommend this camera for any one who is looking for a compact, easy to use, great zoom,great megapixel, you will not be disappointed!

Reviews.Title: Great Point and Shoot
Reviews.Author: <3 ophelia <3
Reviews.Content: Received this today, so I haven't had a very long time to play, but my first impression is very good.I did test shots to compare with my Fujifilm FinePix S5200, which I have had for years, and love, but it can be bulky to carry around, and I thought with improvements in digital cameras in the last five years, I might be able to get a smaller camera that takes the same quality photos as I'm used to, or that is close enough that I won't mind keeping it in my purse for when I don't want to lug the FinePix around.  The Panasonic comes pretty close in all aspects and even surpasses the FinePix in a few.  Before buying this camera I did a side by side with the FinePix and my mom's Nikon CoolPix (not sure what model, towards the lower end of the line though), and the photos from the CoolPix lacked the depth and definition of the FinePix.Based on the test shots, here is what I think:-Great indoor photos with and without flash.-Flash shots do not look anywhere near as bad as flash photos usually look to me.-Vivid, saturated colors, almost in the realm of too warm, esp. in comparison to the FinePix which looked washed out in comparison.-Quite a zoom for a compact camera-Photos had more depth and detail than what I got on my mom's CoolPix, but they were just shy of the sharpness of the FinePix-Auto Intelligent feature seems quite accurate, although it always uses flash inside, and I tend to turn my flash off unless I absolutely need it.I like the construction of the body, it feels very solid, and although it is a little bit bigger than I wanted for my small camera, the quality of the photos is so high that I do not mind at all.

Reviews.Title: Jack of All Trades
Reviews.Author: Antonio
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace a broken Kodak. I'm almost glad the Kodak broke because I like this Panasonic better. There are lots of options for a casual photographer but not too many for a novice -- good for point-and-shoot. The video and image quality is great, but if you're really particular, you'll need to mess with the settings a lot to find the perfect mode for any given situation. The one thing that the Kodak really did better was video recording. Although I prefer the Panasonic's video format, the Kodak allowed you to zoom while recording and the Panasonic doesn't. Also, Kodak recorded from two mic's, allowing for stereo sound; the Panasonic doesn't. But for casual recording, the Panasonic is more than adequate, especially when you consider the HD recording quality. One more quality I prefer about the Kodak: being able to recharge its battery without removing the battery. I suppose there are pro's and con's to either method, but I personally preferred the non-removable battery (and, no, I didn't use a docking station).

Reviews.Title: Great Pictures!!
Reviews.Author: RMi
Reviews.Content: The pictures are great, a d the size is perfect t for wearing on my belt and having my camera always ready!

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: M. E. Ritter
Reviews.Content: This is just what the Dr ordered. A great little camera to take everywhere, everyday.When the big digital SLR wants to stay safe at home, off I go with the Lumix!!

Reviews.Title: Poor photo quality and menu system
Reviews.Author: Robert A. Fea
Reviews.Content: Pros: Love the 8x zoom and the HD videoCons:Soft photos - No contrast and very minimal definition. I was hoping for sharper pictures from a 14MP camera.Elementary menu system - It looks like it was a total after-thought.Video upload difficulties - can't get them to upload correctly. For some reason the camera creates a duplicate .jpg file for every .mov file.No zooming while taking videos - I knew this when I bought it and it's not a showstopper for me, but it would be nice.Summary: I returned mine to Amazon and will be going with a trusty canon. I was excited about the 8X zoom, but if the photo quality stinks, zooming in just gives you a close-up picture with bad quality. I'd rather have a 4x zoom with high quality.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted.
Reviews.Author: Jon Seibert
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a simple, small, good quality, easy to use digital camera that did not cost an arm and a leg, had great battery life and took high resolution pictures to take on a long vacation.  I found it in this camera.  I have put it through the paces and it performed better than expected.  The fact that it cost less than I was originally budgeted for it made it all the better.And I still am learning to use its more sophisticated settings and features that will come in handy on my next vacation...besides already using it for work and making it earn its keep!

Reviews.Title: Awsome
Reviews.Author: Joseph Kok
Reviews.Content: Awsome product with an awsome price.Just to let those who are looking for a budget camera around this price,this camera have outbeat & outclass the rest of its competitor.Like the usual capturing speed & red eye correction.Trust me ...no other came closeJoseph K of RHS

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera in this price range!
Reviews.Author: Carol A. Thomas "Carol T."
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera early in the year for every day use. The picture quality is excellent. It works great with my Macbook. I have been able to take some great pictures while traveling and now I carry it in my purse all the time in case something interesting comes up. I recently joined the local photography club and plan to use this camera until I learn enough to make it worthwhile to upgrade.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Jenny "Healthy Girl"
Reviews.Content: Got this camera as a gift after sending back two others (Kodak & Fuji). The third times the charm because I love this camera!  The 8x zoom is wonderful and I love the quick shutter speed.  I take it everywhere I go and love taking pictures with it.

Reviews.Title: Hard to figure out!
Reviews.Author: Anthony
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for the good reviews and 8x optical zoom.The camera works fine but the software is hard to figure out.If your computer skills are minimal like mine, look at Canonwhich I owned in the past and was easy to use. A very briefoperator guide comes with the camera, which is not much help.When I installed the PHOTOfun 5.0 software it you need to gothrough many steps to get it right. My brain is fried fromspending the last 2 hours trying to figure it out and send aemail with an attached picture. To NO avail. Good Grief CharlieBrown !!!!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: CMC
Reviews.Content: As a first time Digital Camera experience, I'm blown away that it's a dream...researched thoroughly and feel that I got the perfect one...easy to use and excellent quality pix...still and video...only small complaint is:can't record video with insufficient light indoors...

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Don Burke "Somewhat a geek"
Reviews.Content: Lots easier to use than my current camera.  Videos work great.  I like the compact size, wish it did have a viewfinder for use in direct sunlight.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for travel
Reviews.Author: Nancy
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera for a cruise through Northern Europe based on it's size and consumer ratings.  Picture quality was great and loved being able to carry it in a shirt pocket.  It was a good buy!

Reviews.Title: initial experience with panasonic DMC- PH20
Reviews.Author: Eugene Y. Moroz
Reviews.Content: Only have had preliminary experience with the Lumix, but it has been a pleasure taking pictures with it - particularly like its 8X optical zoom.  It is well worth my investment.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Benjones
Reviews.Content: This was my first point and shoot camera to buy in about 8 years, so it was DEFINITELY going to be better, but this thing is phenominal! I love the zoom, and the pictures are CRYSTAL CLEAR!

Reviews.Title: LUMIX USER FRIENDLY
Reviews.Author: Paul Racine
Reviews.Content: I like the camera very much, it is quite user friendly, the only neg. comment would be that you can't zoom while videoing,but it seems great otherwise.

Reviews.Title: Excellent point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: Carlos Eduardo Jimenez "carlos jimenez fagioli"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera a month ago, just to replace an Sony Cybershoot 7.1 MP. In a few words PANASONIC it's a very good option if you considered good quality and standar price. Go Panasonic, you are going to love it. Sony still very expensive.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera!
Reviews.Author: flowerlady
Reviews.Content: I really like the size and features of this camera. The functions are easy to use. Ihave not used the video yet. Good picture resolution. So far I am happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Too bad I can:t give a zero rating
Reviews.Author: R. Cooper "rrc"
Reviews.Content: This camera is great! The reliability of the company is zero. In three months the lens would not retract. Sent for service with all supporting documents. They refused service because the unit was not in warranty. Wrote a second letter and that was ignored. Finally, sent a letter to the CEO with a return receipt. The signature on the receipt was just a wavy line and the letter was ignored. With all the excellent cameras on the market, it is really unbelievable that a company would thumb their nose at a customer.

Reviews.Title: it came in damaged
Reviews.Author: MegO
Reviews.Content: I received the camera and was pretty excited about it but, it came in damaged and I had return the camera. There were large scratches on the front and the back. The company didn't have another to replace this one so, they ended up refunding my money.

Reviews.Title: very good camera, not the best one, good value
Reviews.Author: Jean C. "Jean C."
Reviews.Content: very good camera, not the best one, good value, solid made, battery life is very decent, video quality is very good (.MOV format),8x optical zoom & 14 megapixels is defintly a plus, outdoor pictures are great, nevertheless, i really dont like the quality of inndors & night pictures, like on a party or landscape,quality of video, sharpness & colors decreases a LOT....

Reviews.Title: Does not live up to expectations
Reviews.Author: Lars Sveen "Lars"
Reviews.Content: Bought this based on reviews and I am disappointed.I think the zoom is not timed correctly with the flash.  Night shots and zoomed shots do not look good.  Surprising because it seems to have a good lens.  Also this camera has absolutely no bells and whistles, and it's a bit bulkier than I'd like.  I much prefer the Canon Elph.Close portrait and macro shots are the only thing it does well.  And it does do those quite spectacularly.  If you just want something for snapping pics at family gatherings, then this camera is spectacularly suited to you.  Or if you love macro shots but don't want to spend a fortune on a good SLR.

Reviews.Title: not the quality I expected
Reviews.Author: i love target "sgb"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera in February and it is no longer working now in August.  It's stuck permanently on an ERROR (ZOOM).  I have tried correcting the problem myself but have not had success so I will have to pay a professional to make it operational again.  Instead, I'm going to return it and get my money back.  Also, the quality of pictures is very poor.

Reviews.Title: bad battery
Reviews.Author: amory "amryblaine"
Reviews.Content: i received my camera yesterday.  the first problem i had was trying to load the software;  i tried three times but in each instance my computer froze and i had to run the uninstall program and then attempt, unsuccessfully to load it again.  ok, i could live with that since i was not interested in the software provided.  then i shot some pictures using the battery straight from the package and i will agree the picture quality was, for me, excellent.  a while later i noticed that battery was low so i put it in the charger and removed it when fully charged.  i shot a few more pictures loaded them into picassa, deleted them from the camera, then turned the camera off;  i noted at the time that the battery indicator was already showing a substantial amount of charge used.  this am i turned the camera on again to better familiarize myself with it and within a few minutes it turned off due to low battery.  i am supposing, and i have no proof of this, that i got an item that had been returned previously, perhaps because of this issue;  or the battery had been removed and an older one substituted.  i am in the process of securing an RMA and thought i would put this out there for potential buyers.  i never post on the review page because i am almost always satisfied with my purchases.  however, not this time.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: ftmorganfoleys
Reviews.Content: I've always wanted a Leica.... so when the price dropped on the FH20 ( Lumix... Everyman's Leica ) I had to get it.... It works great, and as far as problems with the limited image formats or low light noise..... Get Over It!  This camera has great features for the money!.!. So, So far- so good - I'll update this after I've dropped it and stuff..... Oh, and BTW, this is about the 100th item I've purchased through Amazon - and while I'd love to say they suck - I've never had a problem with ANYTHING in the process.......

Reviews.Title: Questionable lens quality with light distortion
Reviews.Author: Tien Lin
Reviews.Content: This was my first digital camera and I really wanted to like it.  After receiving the camera I started testing the photo and video quality.  It didn't take long to discover a major issue.  When I operate the camera with any light source near or within the view finder, you get a very visible, very annoying, vertical light reflection/distortion of blue and yellow coming from the light source such as light bulbs.  I tested in every place with light bulbs inside my apartment and it always showed the distortion from the LCD display.  The blue and yellow verticial light was even captured and played back in the HD video using the camera.  I have never seen such a problem with my friend's digital cameras, Flip, or other video equipment.  I tried different settings including different ISO settings and nothing helped.  I think the lense is defective.  I wanted to like it, but I returned it for refund.

Reviews.Title: Good except in low-light situations
Reviews.Author: Horatius83 "Horatius83"
Reviews.Content: It's a good camera, easy to use, but with some graininess in low-light situations. This is my 3rd Panasonic camera and I'm very pleased with the result.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Camera!!!
Reviews.Author: carolm43 "Carolm"
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this camera!  It's a great value in its price range.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera For The Price
Reviews.Author: Anna
Reviews.Content: I own an older Lumix and I love it, so when I wanted to buy cameras for my siblings this summer I bought two of these new ones and they were very happily received gifts! For the money this is an excellent camera - it has a super zoom which allows you to photograph things from far away, which will be great for my stepsister taking photos of her horses in the pasture, and it is absolutely tiny, which is great for my brother as he likes to stuff everything (ipod, books, you name it) into the pockets of his cargo pants. It takes wonderful photos and makes it really easy to grab a quick home movie on the fly. The controls are nicely balanced, if you just want to get a snapshot without thinking about it too hard it is easy to use in idiot mode, and if you want to have more input into what your picture looks like there are plenty of serious-photographer options for you to choose from, although there is no manual focus. And it comes in variety of fun colours - I chose a red one for my stepsister and a black one for my brother.Unlike my older Lumix - a DMC TZ3 - this one does not come with a Leica lens, it has an 8x optical zoom rather than a 10x optical zoom, and it is manufactured in China rather than Japan. But then again it costs less than half the price I paid for my old DMC TZ3, and it is about half the size. If you want a Leica-lensed more serious Lumix you can still buy one, they make new models with the Leica lens, loads more options and a price to match - this one, the DMC ZS7 looks pretty awesome: Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS7 12.1 MP Digital Camera with 12x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 3.0-Inch LCD (Black). But if you want to get a great camera for a very low price you will be very happy with this one, it is a lot of fun in a small package.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed!!  NEVER again Panasonic Lumix!!
Reviews.Author: P. Seiter "foto hobbyist"
Reviews.Content: I have been using this camera for almost a year, and after printing my holiday pictures, I am totally disappointed with the Lumix brand. ALL indoor pictures are pretty much horrible.  Although this camera takes good outdoor shots (most cameras do)the bad indoor shots make me regret no returning this camera.
